title: Pool Party Lee Sin Myth

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Pool Party Lee Sin Discussion

body:
Is Lee Sin wearing a (full) hat or is he just bald on the splash art? 
It looks like Lee is wearing a normal hat since the colour of his upper part of the head doesnt match the colour of his face. Further, Ingame it looks more like a hat than him being bald on this one. 
Need riot support on answering this difficult question (xd)!
